name: Tronpical
description:
Welcome to Tronpical! Go! Go! Go! Run around and try to be the last person standing! Watch out! Not only do you have to watch out for the ground below you, but for the other players around you as well. Be careful! Stand still for too long, and you'll find yourself "submerged" at the bottom of the ocean...

Credits
  • Alexis Serna - Player/UI Programming & Voxel Modeler
    • (GitHub) ASGitH
    • (LinkedIn) Alexis Serna
    • (Twitter) ASGDTweet
  • David Warford - Gameplay/Networking Programmer
    • (Email) davidwarfordgamedev@gmail.com
    • (LinkedIn) David Warford
Controls
  • WASD to move
  • Mouse to look around
  • Space to jump
Installation Instructions
  • Download the RAR file, extract it, and run the executable (.exe).
Repository Link

ASGitH/unity-Weekly-Game-Jam-Week-213 (github.com)

Tools Used
  • Game Engine - Unity Game Engine
  • Hamachi - LAN emulator, connect to each other as if you were on a local network, no port forwarding is required. (To find out how to set up an online "LAN" server, please take a look at the Repository Link for more information)
  • Modeling Software - MagicaVoxel
